page.title: 05LOCAL PEOPLE (OAKENGATES)
page.content:
Rev. C. Hart. _____________ Rev. C. Hart became the vicar at Wombridge in December 1982. Before this he lived in Sheffield where he used to teach. He likes being a vicar but when he was a boy it was the last thing he wanted to do. His ambition, then, was to be an army officer!
Mr.Arnold, Headmaster. _____________________ Wrockwardine Wood is a comprehensive school with 1007 pupils. It opened in 1933. There are 61 classrooms, including the sports rooms. Most of the children from Wombridge Primary School go there.The school uniform is mainly royal blue. Mr. Arnold enjoys being its headmaster.
